page.title: 19MACHINE RESEARCH
page.content: An important firm on the Hurdsfield Industrial Estate is{MTIRA}the centre for Machine Technology, which is there to help British Industry.It does detective work in solving problems on the way machines perform, finds ways to control noise, uses lasers to measure accuracy,and helps to improve machines and their performance. Because robots are used in industry MTIRA has prepared a Code of Practice "Safeguarding Industrial Robots". They have also produced skilled methods of testing machines for Safety standards. Computers are used to help Designers and Engineers, and there is a very useful Library. Through these and many other services the centre aims to ensure high standards in industry.FIRESNOW,and industrial unit of a different kind, produces fire extinguishing equipment.
